articles.description: Sacha Baron Cohen offered Donald Trump a role in his new film after the president called him 'a creep'- and the funnyman has now taken it back following his 'sad' performance in past week
articles.content:
Sacha Baron Cohen has mocked Donald Trump on Twitter after he lost the the 2020 US election to Joe Biden. 
Trump spoke out about when he met the comedian last month after his new film Borat 2 was re… [+2247 chars]

articles.author: By Jack Wright For Mailonline
articles.title: Carol Thatcher slams 'ridiculous' TV and film portrayals of her family - Daily Mail
articles.description: The daughter of Britain's first woman Prime Minister, a journalist and author who won I'm A Celebrity, was responding to reports that the Netflix show will imply that Thatcher favoured her son.
articles.content:
Margaret Thatcher's daughter Carol has blasted 'irrelevant and ridiculous' film and TV portrayals of her family ahead of the new series of The Crown.
The daughter of Britain's first woman Prime Mini… [+2487 chars]
